I have two requirements:
 1) a list of URLs (with scoping specified) needs=
 to be crawled.
 2) I need the list to be crawled within a reasonable and s=
pecific time.

Based on these two parameters, can I get a rough cost estima=
te from IA for my crawl? What factors are considered before a cost-estimate=
 is offered to the client or will I be given the estimate only after the cr=
awl is over. Then also I would be interested in knowing the cost and what f=
actors influence it.

Thanks,
Pranay
